title: Club Penguin is getting deleted in one month?
body:
There is only one word for my emotions right now.

Heartbroken.

I remember when I adopted my first puffle.

I remember playing Pizzatron 5000 because you could farm like 100k gold every hour off that game.

I remember marrying some random chick in my igloo, who was probably a 68 year old Russian pedophile irl.

Club Penguin, I will miss you sorely.
